EmailTemplate.name: Kevlar gloves (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr Ms {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in genuine Kevlar® made by DuPont.
Our company does not sell gloves or sleeves made of Kevlar® directly.. We include below a link where you will find a list of our partners who produce and sell those products:
http://www.dupont.co.uk/products-and-services/personal-protective-equipment/cut-protection/faqs/where-to-buy-kevlar-gloves.html
In case you have any other question, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Sincerely,
DuPont Product Information Service EMEA
